Exception class

　The Exception class is a class for creating an exception object.
　The syntax of the constructor is as follows:

new Exception(<exception_message>)
　The exception_message sets the message property of the generated exception object.
　The trace property also records information such as the functions that were passed before the exception occurred (recorded as a human-readable string).
　All exception objects caused by factors other than syntax errors are objects of the Exception class (for example, division error exceptions).

　We may increase the available properties in the future.

message

　The message property is a property that contains the cause for the exception.
